messages.content: For decades Labour and the Conservatives have been taking it in turns to run Britain. We've seen all they can offer. This election, it's time to do something different.
It's time for real change across Britain with Nick Clegg and the Liberal Democrats.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: No tax on the first Â£10,000 you earn
Action to get our economy moving again
Clean up politics and give you the power to sack corrupt MPs
3000 more police on our streets and action to protect frontline NHS services

mentions.tacticalSituation: In many parts of Britain, it's a choice between the Liberal Democrats and Labour

issues.economy: Action to get our economy moving again
issues.governance: Clean up politics and give you the power to sack corrupt MPs
issues.health: Action to protect frontline NHS services
